## Installation

You can install the released version of paperdigger from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("paperdigger")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("KiayangQ/paperdigger")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to download.

```{r example}
library(paperdigger)
## basic example code
paper_dig()

```
